^\\$schema$.$comment: Allow "$schema" properties to set the appropriate schema.

subtitle.description: Document subtitle. Included in HTML, EPUB, LaTeX, ConTeXt, and docx documents

abstract-title.description: Title of abstract, currently used only in HTML, EPUB, and docx.

abstract.$comment: Use "front matter" instead of a metadata file.
abstract.description: Document summary. Included in HTML, LaTeX, ConTeXt, AsciiDoc, and docx documents

description.description: Document description. Included in ODT, docx and pptx metadata. Some applications show this as Comments metadata.

category.description: Document category. Included in docx and pptx metadata.

keywords.description: The list of keywords to be included in HTML, PDF, ODT, pptx, docx and AsciiDoc metadata.

lang.description: Identifies the main language of the document using IETF language tags.

dir.description: The base script direction, either rtl (right-to-left) or ltr (left-to-right).

csl.description: The Citation Style Language file or URL. Defines the citation styling.
